page.description: Exports the selected records to Excel.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUICK_EXPORT() method exports the currently selected records to Excel. Only the fields on the current form are exported. Alpha Anywhere automatically opens Excel and displays the exported records. If you want more control over the which fields and records are exported, define an Export operation.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button on a form. It exports the currently selected records to Excel :
